text: The Copa del Generalísimo 1940 Final was the 38th final of the King's Cup. The final was played at Campo de Fútbol de Vallecas in Madrid, on 30 June 1940, being won by CD Español, who beat Madrid CF 3-2 after extra time. ==Details== {| width="100%" |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" |colspan="4"|CD Español: |- !width="25"| !!width="25"| |- |GK ||1|| José Trías |- |DF ||2|| Ricardo Teruel |- |DF ||3|| Benito Pérez (c) |- |MF ||4|| Jaime Arasa |- |MF ||5|| Isidro Rovira |- |MF ||6|| Félix Llimós |- |FW ||7|| Felipe Ara |- |FW ||8|| Gabriel Jorge |- |FW ||9|| Vicent Martínez Catalá |- |FW||10|| Juli Gonzalvo |- |FW||11|| Francisco Mas |- |colspan=4|Manager: |- |colspan="4"| Patricio Caicedo |} |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" align=center |colspan="4"|Madrid CF: |- !width="25"| !!width="25"| |- |GK ||1|| Enrique Esquiva |- |DF ||2|| José Mardones |- |DF ||3|| Jacinto Quincoces (c) |- |MF ||4|| Villita |- |MF ||5|| Antonio Bonet |- |MF ||6|| Juan Antonio Ipiña |- |FW ||7|| Luis Marín |- |FW ||8|| Chus Alonso |- |FW ||9|| Manuel Alday |- |FW||10|| Simón Lecue |- |FW||11|| Emilín |- |colspan=4|Manager: |- |colspan="4"| Francisco Bru |- |} |} ==References== 1940 Copa Category:RCD Espanyol matches Category:Real Madrid CF matches
title: 1940 Copa del Generalísimo Final
